meanings.definition: The process by which new species evolve from a common ancestor through the branching of lineages.
meanings.sent1: Cladogenesis is like a family tree growing new branches over time.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cladogenesis to understand how different species come into existence.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, cladogenesis was the talk of the town!
meanings.sent4: The concept of cladogenesis is as revolutionary as the invention of the wheel.
meanings.sent5: Imagine cladogenesis as a tree sprouting new types of fruit with each generation.

meanings.definition: The splitting of a single lineage into two or more separate lineages.
meanings.sent1: During cladogenesis, a single family line can divide into multiple distinct paths.
meanings.sent2: The process of cladogenesis results in the formation of diverse lineages.
meanings.sent3: The family picnic turned into a cladogenesis event with relatives going in different directions.
meanings.sent4: Cladogenesis is like a river splitting into several smaller streams.
meanings.sent5: In nature, cladogenesis is akin to a single road branching off into multiple new roads.
